Name: Oblitus
About the game: Test your limits against a brutal and mysterious world as Parvus, a curious warrior with no memory and a heavy burden. Raise your spear and cast ancient spells as you battle hostile creatures and towering bosses in procedurally-generated 2D landscapes that are both beautiful and dangerous. Answer the call. Break the cycle. Change your destiny. Key Features: Intense difficulty to challenge even veteran gamers Explore four procedurally-generated realms that change each time you play Gorgeous 2D environments featuring dynamic lava/water, realistic lighting, and more Every playthrough is a unique experience with multiple endings to discover Spear-based combat requires both precision and agility Magic system with 22 unique enchantments Unsettling music and immersive sound design with a haunting and mysterious atmosphere From independent developer Connor Ullmann and Adult Swim Games
Meta Title: Oblitus: Feb 27, 2015, Connor Ullmann and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Oblitus? Check out the release date (Feb 27, 2015), developer insights from Connor Ullmann, and a complete game summary.
